thread.section_title: Breaking news on air travel - breakingnews.com
thread.title: Southwest Airlines statement on technical glitch: 'We are experiencing technology issues today which is requiring us to process customers manually. Please arrive to the airport at least two hours prior to your scheduled flight time. We have teams across the system working diligently to determine a cause. We appreciate your patience while we work to resolve the issue' - @SouthwestAir
thread.title_full: Southwest Airlines statement on technical glitch: 'We are experiencing technology issues today which is requiring us to process customers manually. Please arrive to the airport at least two hours prior to your scheduled flight time. We have teams across the system working diligently to determine a cause. We appreciate your patience while we work to resolve the issue' - @SouthwestAir

author: Rebecca Bratek
title: Southwest Airlines statement on technical glitch: 'We are experiencing technology issues today which is requiring us to process customers manually. Please arrive to the airport at least two hours prior to your scheduled flight time. We have teams across the system working diligently to determine a cause. We appreciate your patience while we work to resolve the issue' - @SouthwestAir
text: Oct 11, 2015, 04:54 PM GMT ( 16:54 ) Southwest Airlines statement on technical glitch: 'We are experiencing technology issues today which is requiring us to process customers manually. Please arrive to the airport at least two hours prior to your scheduled flight time. We have teams across the system working diligently to determine a cause. We appreciate your patience while we work to resolve the issue' - @SouthwestAir End of alert
